Name: MorphItemCollection
Notes: Displays a model of a power-up that cannot be collected. These objects only serve a decorative purpose. Natively, only the Spring, Bee, Boo, Fire, Cloud, Rock and Drill power-ups are supported. Can be registered to Starship Mario events via MarioFaceShipNpcRegister.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

MarioFaceShipNpcRegister.Description: Can be registered to a Starship Mario NPC appearance event.
